About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

About Myself

Hi, I’m Chetan Punj, an aspiring software engineer currently in my sophomore year at Anand International College of Engineering, Jaipur. My passion lies in software development, artificial intelligence, and robotics, where I constantly strive to learn, innovate, and create impactful solutions to real-world problems.

My journey into technology has been fueled by a mix of curiosity and hands-on experience. By diving deep into the core concepts of software and AI, and applying them vividly to various projects, I’ve developed a solid foundation and a relentless drive to explore new possibilities.

What I Do

I thrive at the intersection of hardware and software, where I combine my technical expertise with creativity to design solutions that make a difference. Some of my standout projects include:

  • Educational Robot for Primary Students: Developed a robot using ESP32, voice commands, and a multimedia database to make learning more engaging for young students.
  • IoT-Based Voice-Controlled Media Player: Built a system integrating Bluetooth speakers, voice commands, and SQL databases for seamless media playback.

Achievements

  • Winner: Internal Smart India Hackathon 2024, representing my college on the national stage.
  • Leadership Roles: Captain of the Robotics Club and a Student Council Member, where I mentor peers and spearhead innovative initiatives.
  • Hackathon Enthusiast: Successfully participated in events like Tata Crucible Quiz 2024 and Prod-E-G Hackathon, earning recognition for creative problem-solving.

Skills and Expertise

I have hands-on experience with a range of tools and technologies, including:

  • Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript, C/C++
  • Web Development: Node.js, Express.js, MySQL
  • Hardware and IoT: ESP32/ESP8266, Arduino, Bluetooth Modules
  • AI and Automation: Exploring NLP and machine learning for future projects

My Aspirations

I am driven by a desire to contribute to cutting-edge advancements in technology. My goal is to create AI-driven solutions that simplify lives and empower industries. I’m also deeply interested in fostering collaboration and innovation, mentoring teams, and learning from like-minded individuals.

Beyond Tech

Outside of academics, I enjoy participating in hackathons, networking as a Campus Ambassador, and brainstorming new ideas to blend tech and creativity. My approach to life is built on curiosity, persistence, and a love for problem-solving.
